sketch.util.cli

Class CliOptionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.util.cli.CliOptionGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CliAnnotatedOptionGroup

    public abstract class CliOptionGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    a group of options. subclasses are initialized by making calls in the constructor; see e.g. ScSynthesisOptions for an example.
    Author:
    gatoatigrado (nicholas tung) [email: ntung at ntung]
